text:
'Fairytales really do exist!' Paris Hilton and Chris Zylka are engaged

Huge congratulations are in order!

Paris Hilton and actor Chris Zylka are officially engaged.

The couple were in Aspen, Colardo for a holiday ski trip when the actor popped the question over the weekend, her rep confirmed to People.

The heiress told the magazine:

“I am so excited to be engaged to the love of my life and my best friend. “I have never felt so happy, safe and loved. "He is perfect for me in every way and showed me that fairytales really do exist!”

https://www.instagram.com/p/Bdc913pn0MZ/?taken-by=parishilton

According to the publication, the couple were posing for a picture in the ski town when he got down on one knee.

On the emotional moment, the 36-year-old businesswoman said:

“I was so excited and surprised! I immediately said yes!”

The pair first met at a party during Oscars season almost a decade ago, but lost touch and didn't end up reconnecting until two years ago.

They went public with their relationship on social media in February 2017 with a sweet Instagram photo.

https://www.instagram.com/p/BQraxpCDg5Z/

The couple sparked engagement rumours earlier this week when she was spotted with a dazzling diamond ring while they were strolling around the ski town.

The Simple Life star recently paid tribute to her beau with a sweet Instagram post.

She wrote:

"Never in a million years did I think I would find someone so completely perfect for me. "Someone who would make me happier than I ever dreamed I could be. Someone that would touch my life so profoundly & give me a whole new reason to breathe. "But then I found you & realized that everything I anticipated you to be doesn't even compare to how incredibly amazing you are..."

Photo via Getty.
title: 'Fairytales really do exist!' Paris Hilton and Chris Zylka are engaged
